DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study evaluating changes in frailty and associated impairments in older heart failure patients receiving left ventricular assist device therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Frailty: Prevalence and Response to Left Ventricular Assist Device Therapy in Older Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: 60 years old or older Scheduled to undergo left ventricular assist device implantation at Thomas Jefferson University Unable or unwilling to provide informed consent Unable to complete baseline frailty assessment
